cards.card_description: The Magician represents manifestation, creativity, and the power of manifestation. It suggests the ability to use your imagination and will to make your dreams a reality.
cards.reversed_meaning: Manipulation, poor planning, lack of focus, being dishonest

cards.card_description: The High Priestess represents intuition, mystery, and the feminine principle. It suggests relying on your instincts and inner wisdom to guide you through life.
cards.reversed_meaning: Lack of intuition, misdirection, unconsciousness, passiveness

cards.card_description: The Empress represents nurturing, abundance, and motherhood. It suggests taking care of yourself and others, and being in touch with nature and the cycles of life.
cards.reversed_meaning: Lack of nurturing, scarcity, infertility, unfeminine behavior
